## Flight cancelled

Lots of flights have `NA`s in `dep_delay` or `arr_delay`. These are apparently cancelled flights. Letâ€™s get rid of them here, and save the result to a nice name in case we want to use it later. Notice that you need to day the name of the data frame at the end of the code cell to show it in the notebook.

```{r}

not_cancelled <- flights |>
    filter(!is.na(dep_delay) & !is.na(arr_delay))
not_cancelled
```
